metadata.title: CVE-2022-48981 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/shmem-helper: Remove errant put in error pathdrm_gem_shmem_mmap() doesn't own this reference, resulting in the GEMobject getting prematurely freed leading to a later use-after-free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48981` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-67-generic - 5.15.0-67.74
